bookForm.title: Book a Tour
bookForm.leaveRequest: Leave a request and our manager will contact you
bookForm.name: Your name
bookForm.errorName: Name must be at least 3 characters

accordionQuestion.title: How can I book a tour?
accordionQuestion.desc: You can easily book a tour by filling out our convenient online form on the website. Alternatively, you can contact us by phone at +998 (95) 323-88-80 or by email at thtagency02@gmail.com for assistance.

accordionQuestion.title: What documents will I need for the trip?
accordionQuestion.desc: For international travel, you will need a visa, passport, and possibly medical insurance. Detailed instructions will be provided upon booking.

accordionQuestion.title: Can I add additional nights of accommodation?
accordionQuestion.desc: Yes, you can extend the duration of your stay by adding additional nights of accommodation. Please contact us to discuss this option.

accordionQuestion.title: What are the rules for flight cancellation or delay?
accordionQuestion.desc: The cancellation and delay policy depends on the airline. We recommend reviewing the rules and recommendations on the airline's website or contacting us for detailed information
